00020 #include "SyncMacros.h"
00021 #include "SyncNode.h"
00022 #include "SyncTreeWorker.h"
00023 #include "SyncHashCache.h"
00024 #include "SyncUtil.h"
00025 #include <stdlib.h>

00029 extern void
00030 SyncTreeWorkerInit(struct SyncTreeWorkerHead *head,
00031                    struct SyncHashCacheEntry *ent) {
00032     SyncTreeWorkerReset(head, 0);
00033     if (ent != NULL) {
00034         struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *sp = &head->stack[0];
00035         sp->pos = 0;
00036         sp->cacheEntry = ent;
00037         ent->busy++;
00038         head->level = 1;
00039     }
00040 }
00041 
00042 extern struct SyncTreeWorkerHead *
00043 SyncTreeWorkerCreate(struct SyncHashCacheHead *cache,
00044                      struct SyncHashCacheEntry *ent) {
00045     struct SyncTreeWorkerHead * head = NEW_STRUCT(1, SyncTreeWorkerHead);
00046     int lim = 4;
00047     struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry * stack = NEW_STRUCT(lim, SyncTreeWorkerEntry);
00048     head->stack = stack;
00049     head->lim = lim;
00050     head->cache = cache;
00051     SyncTreeWorkerInit(head, ent);
00052     return head;
00053 }
00054 
00055 extern struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *
00056 SyncTreeWorkerTop(struct SyncTreeWorkerHead *head) {
00057     if (head->level <= 0) return NULL;
00058     struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *stack = head->stack;
00059     struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *ent = &stack[head->level - 1];
00060     return ent;
00061 }
00062 
00063 extern struct SyncNodeElem *
00064 SyncTreeWorkerGetElem(struct SyncTreeWorkerHead *head) {
00065     struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *ent = SyncTreeWorkerTop(head);
00066     if (ent == NULL) return NULL;
00067     struct SyncHashCacheEntry *ce = ent->cacheEntry;
00068     if (ce == NULL) return NULL;
00069     struct SyncNodeComposite *nc = ce->ncL;
00070     if (nc == NULL) nc = ce->ncR;
00071     if (nc == NULL) return NULL;
00072     int pos = ent->pos;
00073     if (pos < 0 || pos >= nc->refLen) return NULL;
00074     struct SyncNodeElem *ref = &nc->refs[pos];
00075     return ref;
00076 }
00077 
00078 extern struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *
00079 SyncTreeWorkerPush(struct SyncTreeWorkerHead *head) {
00080     struct SyncNodeElem *ref = SyncTreeWorkerGetElem(head);
00081     if (ref == NULL || (ref->kind & SyncElemKind_leaf))
00082         return NULL;
00083     struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *ent = SyncTreeWorkerTop(head);
00084     struct SyncHashCacheEntry *ce = ent->cacheEntry;
00085     if (ce == NULL) return NULL;
00086     struct SyncNodeComposite *nc = ce->ncL;
00087     if (nc == NULL) nc = ce->ncR;
00088     if (nc == NULL) return NULL;
00089     struct ccn_buf_decoder cbd;
00090     struct ccn_buf_decoder *cb = SyncInitDecoderFromOffset(&cbd, nc,
00091                                                            ref->start,
00092                                                            ref->stop);
00093     const unsigned char *xp = NULL;
00094     ssize_t xs = 0;
00095     SyncGetHashPtr(cb, &xp, &xs);
00096     ce = SyncHashLookup(head->cache, xp, xs);
00097     if (ce == NULL)
00098         // no entry?  this is not so good
00099         return NULL;
00100     struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *stack = head->stack;
00101     int level = head->level;
00102     int oLim = head->lim;
00103     if (level > oLim) {
00104         // something bad has happened
00105         return NULL;
00106     }
00107     if (level == oLim) {
00108         // first, expand the stack to get enough room
00109         int nLim = oLim + oLim / 2 + 4;
00110         struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *nStack = NEW_STRUCT(nLim,
00111                                                         SyncTreeWorkerEntry);
00112         memcpy(nStack, stack, level*sizeof(struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry));
00113         free(stack);
00114         stack = nStack;
00115         head->stack = nStack;
00116         head->lim = nLim;
00117     }
00118     // now we can push the node
00119     head->level = level+1;
00120     ent = &stack[level];
00121     ent->pos = 0;
00122     ent->count = 0;
00123     ent->cacheEntry = ce;
00124     ce->busy++;
00125     head->visits++;
00126     return ent;
00127 }
00128 
00129 extern struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *
00130 SyncTreeWorkerPop(struct SyncTreeWorkerHead *head) {
00131     int level = head->level;
00132     if (level <= 0) return NULL;
00133     level--;
00134     struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *stack = head->stack;
00135     struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *ep = &stack[level];
00136     struct SyncHashCacheEntry *ce = ep->cacheEntry;
00137     if (ce != NULL && ce->busy > 0) ce->busy--;
00138     head->level = level;
00139     if (level <= 0) return NULL;
00140     return &head->stack[level - 1];
00141 }
00142 
00143 extern void
00144 SyncTreeWorkerReset(struct SyncTreeWorkerHead *head, int level) {
00145     if (head == NULL) return;
00146     while (head->level > level) {
00147         SyncTreeWorkerPop(head);
00148     }
00149     if (level > 0) {
00150         head->stack[head->level - 1].pos = 0;
00151     }
00152     head->state = SyncTreeWorkerState_init;
00153 }
00154 
00155 extern struct SyncTreeWorkerHead *
00156 SyncTreeWorkerFree(struct SyncTreeWorkerHead *head) {
00157     if (head != NULL) {
00158         SyncTreeWorkerReset(head, 0);
00159         free(head->stack);
00160         free(head);
00161     }
00162     return NULL;
00163 }
00164 
00165 extern enum SyncCompareResult
00166 SyncTreeLookupName(struct SyncTreeWorkerHead *head,
00167                    struct ccn_charbuf *name,
00168                    int minLevel) {
00169     
00170     enum SyncCompareResult cr = SCR_inside;
00171     while (head->level > minLevel) {
00172         struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *ent = SyncTreeWorkerTop(head);
00173         struct SyncHashCacheEntry *ce = ent->cacheEntry;
00174         if (ce == NULL) return SCR_error;
00175         struct SyncNodeComposite *nc = ce->ncL;
00176         if (nc == NULL) nc = ce->ncR;
00177         if (nc == NULL) return SCR_missing;
00178         int lim = nc->refLen;
00179         if (ent->pos >= lim) {
00180             // done with the current level, go back to the previous level
00181             ent = SyncTreeWorkerPop(head);
00182             if (ent == NULL) break;
00183             ent->pos++;
00184         } else {
00185             
00186             if (ent->pos == 0) {
00187                 // need to check the min and max of the current node
00188                 enum SyncCompareResult cr = SyncNodeCompareMinMax(nc, name);
00189                 if (cr == SCR_after) {
00190                     // not in this node at all, so pop out
00191                     ent->pos = lim;
00192                 } else if (cr != SCR_inside) return cr;
00193             }
00194             if (ent->pos < lim) {
00195                 struct SyncNodeElem *ep = &nc->refs[ent->pos];
00196                 if (ep->kind & SyncElemKind_leaf) {
00197                     // a leaf, so the element name is inline
00198                     cr = SyncNodeCompareLeaf(nc, ep, name);
00199                     if (cr != SCR_after) return cr;
00200                     ent->pos++;
00201                 } else {
00202                     // a node, so try this recursively
00203                     ent = SyncTreeWorkerPush(head);
00204                     if (ent == NULL) {
00205                         return SCR_error;
00206                     }
00207                 }
00208             }
00209         }
00210         
00211     }
00212     return SCR_after;
00213 }
00214 
00215 extern enum SyncCompareResult
00216 SyncTreeGenerateNames(struct SyncTreeWorkerHead *head,
00217                       struct SyncNameAccum *accum,
00218                       int minLevel) {
00219     
00220     while (head->level > minLevel) {
00221         struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *ent = SyncTreeWorkerTop(head);
00222         struct SyncHashCacheEntry *ce = ent->cacheEntry;
00223         if (ce == NULL) return SCR_error;
00224         struct SyncNodeComposite *nc = ce->ncL;
00225         if (nc == NULL) nc = ce->ncR;
00226         if (nc == NULL) return SCR_missing;
00227         int lim = nc->refLen;
00228         if (ent->pos >= lim) {
00229             // done with the current level, go back to the previous level
00230             ent = SyncTreeWorkerPop(head);
00231             if (ent == NULL) break;
00232             ent->pos++;
00233         } else {
00234             struct SyncNodeElem *ep = &nc->refs[ent->pos];
00235             if (ep->kind & SyncElemKind_leaf) {
00236                 // a leaf, so the element name is inline
00237                 struct ccn_buf_decoder bd;
00238                 struct ccn_buf_decoder *d = SyncInitDecoderFromOffset(&bd,
00239                                                                       nc,
00240                                                                       ep->start,
00241                                                                       ep->stop);
00242                 struct ccn_charbuf *cb = ccn_charbuf_create();
00243                 int res = SyncAppendElementInner(cb, d);
00244                 if (res < 0) {
00245                     // that did not work well
00246                     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&cb);
00247                     return SCR_error;
00248                 }
00249                 SyncNameAccumAppend(accum, cb, 0);
00250                 ent->pos++;
00251             } else {
00252                 ent = SyncTreeWorkerPush(head);
00253                 if (ent == NULL) {
00254                     return SCR_error;
00255                 }                
00256             }
00257         }
00258         
00259     }
00260     return SCR_after;
00261 }
00262 
00263 extern int
00264 SyncTreeMarkReachable(struct SyncTreeWorkerHead *head, int minLevel) {
00265     int count = 0;
00266     while (head->level > minLevel) {
00267         struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *ent = SyncTreeWorkerTop(head);
00268         if (ent == NULL) break;
00269         struct SyncHashCacheEntry *ce = ent->cacheEntry;
00270         if (ce == NULL) break;
00271         ce->state |= SyncHashState_marked;
00272         count++;
00273         struct SyncNodeComposite *nc = ce->ncL;
00274         if (nc == NULL) nc = ce->ncR;
00275         if (nc == NULL) break;
00276         int lim = nc->refLen;
00277         if (ent->pos >= lim) {
00278             // done with the current level, go back to the previous level
00279             ent = SyncTreeWorkerPop(head);
00280             if (ent == NULL) break;
00281             ent->pos++;
00282         } else {
00283             struct SyncNodeElem *ep = &nc->refs[ent->pos];
00284             if (ep->kind & SyncElemKind_leaf) {
00285                 // a leaf, so skip it
00286                 ent->pos++;
00287             } else {
00288                 // a node, so push into it
00289                 ent = SyncTreeWorkerPush(head);
00290                 if (ent == NULL) break;
00291             }
00292         }
00293     }
00294     return count;
00295 }
